reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting it feels regal to wear, and appreciate its perfect fit and sturdy construction.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress Very Pleased !
items.body: This dress is perfect for my granddaughter’s fall wedding.The material is very high quality ,soft and comfortable.More beautiful then I thought it would be.I received many compliments and would order it again in a different color if I had another special occasion.I ordered the navy in the xxl . It fit true to size and hid some lumps and bumps well. I also had a full length under slip on underneath to help with the “fall” of the dress. It gave it a very finished look. I’m 5ft 7in and the length was perfect with 2 inch kitten heals. The sleeves were perfect length and not tight or too lose. This dress looks expensive and tasteful. The color is rich and beautiful.You will not be disappointed. Delivery was very fast. Read more
items.author: Norwegian Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress and great fit
items.body: Beautiful dress! Fit was perfect - just as I wanted it. I am 5'6 and wear size M. The color is gorgeous! I wore it once so far and received many compliments. Looks great in pictures! Read more
items.author: ykh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic and comfortable
items.body: Wore this dress for my son’s November wedding. I normally wear a medium, it was too big, thankfully the small arrived the day before the wedding and fit perfect! Dress was comfy and washed well. Got lots of compliments so I guess it did the trick! Read more
items.author: Katherine Stewart

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful dress with a few cons.
items.body: This is a beautiful dress.... I needed a dress to wear to a traditional Jewish winter weather, and this dress was one of the options I purchased. (Thanks Amazon return policy !!) I decided against the this dress. I decided to wear a similar dress (material and length) because of two differences: 1. no puff at the shoulder (I like it with or without the puff, so that wasn't a real deal breaker) and 2. The dress I choose had a zipper in the back. It was the zipper that won out. CON: No Zipper: the lack of zipper really is a con to this dress. If you are one to put your dress and shoes last, then you can really mess up your hair and possibly make-up when pulling this dress over your head. A zipper would allow you to get your hair and make up done and slide the dress on without issue. Belt Loops: while the belt is a nice option to cinch in the waist - thus making this dress that much more flattering, it would have been better to have the loops more to the back of the dress and smaller and/or flatter. PROS: Material: soft, thick, dressy, with a heavy flow. Doesn't really wrinkle. Cut: fits beautiful on the body. I can see this dress flattering many figures. To be honest, I saw two of the Zesica dresses at the wedding on two different body types, and they looked gorgeous. Value for money: Although this dress was slightly heavier/thicker than the dress I chose, the one I ultimately used was $20 less than this one. Depending on your pocket book........you can decide. This is a beautiful dress. Nice winter weight. For special occasion or holiday parties..... If you can live with the cons. Read more
items.author: K.M.B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and great quality
items.body: Beautiful and flattering! I absolutely love it!! Read more
items.author: Griselda Sides

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Packaging ruins this dress
items.body: The dress comes vacuum sealed, and it’s impossible to get out the wrinkles. Have asked for regular packaging, but received sealed once again. Love the dress, but packaging has to change if they want to sell this dress! Read more
items.author: Bailey Harrelson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Defective
items.body: Just received today and needed for a fall wedding tomorrow. The dress is all scratched up or defective when made. I'm not sure. Giving it three stars because it's cute. Otherwise 1 start for the quality.. So disappointed Read more
items.author: JoAnna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Dress: Champagne XL
items.body: Purchased: XL Champagne I really liked this dress. It's comfortable and fit well. Seems to fit larger busted ladies well. I wouldn't call it champagne though; it's not golden. This is a very light pink dress. Perhaps pink champagne would have been a better description. Luckily everything else labeled cream or khaki in my order was also pink/mauve tinged so it worked out fine. Christmas photos attached. I didn't have any issues with steaming the wrinkles away like another reviewer mentioned. Read more
items.author: Julia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Navy, Rose, Mauve, Black, Champagne, Teal Green, Caramel, Dusty Blue, Ponceau, Cobalt. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
